title: HMCL崩溃
author: lbc30
txt_content:
HMCL崩溃，求助！
[21:36:12] [AWT-EventQueue-0/INFO] Start generating launching command...
[21:36:12] [Game Launcher/INFO] Building process
[21:36:12] [Game Launcher/INFO] Logging in...
[21:36:12] [Game Launcher/INFO] Detecting libraries...
[21:36:12] [Game Launcher/INFO] Unpacking natives...
[21:36:16] [Game Launcher/INFO] *** Make shell command ***
[21:36:16] [Game Launcher/INFO] On making head command.
[21:36:16] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Version: null
[21:36:16] [Game Launcher/INFO] Java Platform: 64
[21:36:16] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Platform: 64
[21:36:16] [Game Launcher/INFO] System Physical Memory: 16305
[21:36:16] [Game Launcher/ERROR] 
---- Hello Minecraft! Crash Report ----
  Version: 2.4.1.6
  Time: 2018-10-18 21:36:16
  Thread: Thread[Game Launcher,6,main]

  Content: 
    java.lang.ClassCastException: java.base/jdk.internal.loader.ClassLoaders$AppClassLoader cannot be cast to java.base/java.net.URLClassLoader

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.util.Utils.getURLString(Utils.java:56)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.launch.AbstractMinecraftLoader.makeHeadCommand(AbstractMinecraftLoader.java:133)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.launch.AbstractMinecraftLoader.makeLaunchingCommand(AbstractMinecraftLoader.java:144)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.core.launch.GameLauncher.makeLaunchCommand(GameLauncher.java:110)

    at org.jackhuang.hellominecraft.launcher.util.HMCLGameLauncher$1.run(HMCLGameLauncher.java:88)



-- System Details --
  Operating System: Windows 10 (amd64), 10.0
  Java Version: 9.0.1, Oracle Corporation
  Java VM Version: Java HotSpot(TM) 64-Bit Server VM (mixed mode), Oracle Corporation

replies.author: mine新时代xs
replies.txt_content:
你现在使用的Java版本是9.0.1，不支持这个版本的HMCL
你可以通过更新HMCL启动器的方法解决，最新版本的HMCL是可以使用Java9运行的
也可以通过把Java版本换成Java8的方法解决，转到这个网址https://www.java.com/zh_CN/download/ 可以进入官网下载
